titleInfo.title: Christmas 1999 at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum

mods.abstract: Two color window card (gold and red on beige) announcing the 1999 Christmas events at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum from November 26 through December 24. Poster features woodcuts of holly leaves.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
